source.query:
select distinct vh.id,prty.id as organization_id,vh.name as Name,vh.VIN,vh.plate_number as license_plate_number,
vh.connected_object_status as status,     
null as status_changed_date,
null as termination_date,
vh.vehicle_vid as vid,typ.type as type,
eq.supplier_serial_number as tcu_id,
eq.serial_number as tcu_serial_number,
vh.brand as tcu_brand,
'1.0' as tcu_version,
CASE WHEN eq.serial_number is not null then 'True' ELSE 'False' END is_tcu_register,
NULL as reference_date,
NULL as vehicle_property_id,
vh.creation_date as created_at,
vh.model_name as model_id,
1 as oem_id,
2 as oem_organisation_id,
'H' as opt_in,
vh.last_modification_date as modified_at,
'False' as is_ota,
null as modified_by,
REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.fuelType'),'"','') as fuel_type
from cle_pc_cvp_fap.vehicle vh
left join daf.co_connected_object co
on co.internal_id = vh.vehicle_vid
left join daf.co_connected_object_type typ
on typ.id = co.connected_object_type
left join daf.co_third_party prty
on typ.third_party_id = prty.id
left join cle_pc_cvp_fap.equipment eq
on eq.vehicle_id = vh.id;

activities.name: Vehicle_CHG
activities.description: Compares source and target and find the records for upsert

source.query:
SELECT 
	coalesce(L.ID,0) AS ID,
ORG.ID  as ORGANIZATION_ID,
S.NAME,
S.VIN,
S.LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER,
CASE WHEN  S.STATUS IN ('OPERATING','RESUMING','CREATED','READY','CONNECTED') THEN 'C'
     WHEN  S.STATUS = 'TERMINATING' THEN 'T'
     WHEN  S.STATUS = 'SUSPENDED' THEN 'O'
END AS STATUS,     
S.STATUS_CHANGED_DATE,
S.TERMINATION_DATE,
S.VID,
CASE WHEN S.TYPE = 'RIGID_HEAVY_TRUCK' THEN 'R'
     WHEN S.TYPE = 'ARTICULATED_TRUCK' THEN 'A'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'LCV' THEN 'L'
     WHEN S.TYPE = 'TRAILER' THEN 'T'	 
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'VL'  THEN 'V'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'SEMITRAILER' THEN 'S'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'NONE' THEN 'N'
	 ELSE 'N' END AS TYPE,
S.TCU_ID,
S.TCU_SERIAL_NUMBER,
S.TCU_BRAND,
S.TCU_VERSION,
S.IS_TCU_REGISTER,
S.REFERENCE_DATE,
VP.ID AS VEHICLE_PROPERTY_ID,
(SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(S.CREATED_AT AS TIMESTAMP)) * 1000) AS  CREATED_AT, 
S.MODEL_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) = TRIM(OM.VIN_PREFIX)
     THEN OM.ID
     ELSE (SELECT ID FROM MASTER.OEM WHERE TRIM(VIN_PREFIX) ISNULL)  END AS OEM_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) = TRIM(OM.VIN_PREFIX)
     THEN OM.OEM_ORGANISATION_ID 
     ELSE (SELECT OEM_ORGANISATION_ID FROM MASTER.OEM WHERE TRIM(VIN_PREFIX) ISNULL)  END  AS OEM_ORGANISATION_ID, 
CASE WHEN S.STATUS = 'SUSPENDED' THEN 'U' ELSE 'H' END AS OPT_IN,
(SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(S.MODIFIED_AT AS TIMESTAMP)) * 1000) AS MODIFIED_AT,
S.IS_OTA,
S.MODIFIED_BY,
S.FUEL_TYPE,
	CASE WHEN L.ID IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END AS CHG_FLG,
	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS LOAD_DT
	
FROM
       public.Vehicle S
LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.ORGANIZATION ORG_CT1
ON ORG_CT1.ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID
LEFT JOIN MASTER.ORGANIZATION ORG
ON ORG.ORG_ID = ORG_CT1.ORG_ID
LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.VEHICLEPROPERTIES PVP
ON PVP.VEHICLE_VID = S.VID
LEFT JOIN MASTER.VEHICLEPROPERTIES VP
ON VP.CHASIS_ID = PVP.CHASIS_ID
LEFT JOIN MASTER.OEM OM
ON OM.VIN_PREFIX = SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) AND OM.VIN_PREFIX IS NOT NULL	   
LEFT JOIN 
       master.Vehicle L
ON S.VID = L.VID  AND L.VIN = S.VIN
WHERE ( ORG.ID <>	L.ORGANIZATION_ID	OR
S.name	<>	L.name	OR
S.license_plate_number	<>	L.license_plate_number	OR
CASE WHEN  S.STATUS IN ('OPERATING','RESUMING','CREATED','READY','CONNECTED') THEN 'C'
     WHEN  S.STATUS = 'TERMINATING' THEN 'T'
     WHEN  S.STATUS = 'SUSPENDED' THEN 'O'
END	<>	L.status	OR
S.status_changed_date	<>	L.status_changed_date	OR
S.termination_date	<>	L.termination_date	OR
CASE WHEN S.TYPE = 'RIGID_HEAVY_TRUCK' THEN 'R'
     WHEN S.TYPE = 'ARTICULATED_TRUCK' THEN 'A'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'LCV' THEN 'L'
     WHEN S.TYPE = 'TRAILER' THEN 'T'	 
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'VL'  THEN 'V'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'SEMITRAILER' THEN 'S'
	 WHEN S.TYPE = 'NONE' THEN 'N'
	 ELSE 'N' END	<>	L.TYPE	OR
S.TCU_ID	<>	L.TCU_ID	OR
S.tcu_serial_number	<>	L.tcu_serial_number	OR
S.tcu_brand	<>	L.tcu_brand	OR
S.tcu_version	<>	L.tcu_version  OR
S.is_tcu_register	<>	L.is_tcu_register  OR
S.reference_date	<>	L.reference_date  OR
VP.ID     	<>	L.vehicle_property_id  OR
(SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(S.CREATED_AT AS TIMESTAMP)) * 1000)	<>	L.CREATED_AT  OR
S.model_id	<>	L.model_id  OR
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) = TRIM(OM.VIN_PREFIX)
     THEN OM.ID
     ELSE (SELECT ID FROM MASTER.OEM WHERE TRIM(VIN_PREFIX) ISNULL)  END	<>	L.OEM_ID  OR
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTRING(S.VIN,1,3) = TRIM(OM.VIN_PREFIX)
     THEN OM.OEM_ORGANISATION_ID 
     ELSE (SELECT OEM_ORGANISATION_ID FROM MASTER.OEM WHERE TRIM(VIN_PREFIX) ISNULL)  END	<>	L.OEM_ORGANISATION_ID  OR
CASE WHEN S.STATUS = 'SUSPENDED' THEN 'U' ELSE 'H' END	<>	L.OPT_IN  OR
(SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(S.MODIFIED_AT AS TIMESTAMP)) * 1000)	<>	L.MODIFIED_AT  OR
S.IS_OTA	<>	L.IS_OTA  OR
S.MODIFIED_BY	<>	L.MODIFIED_BY  OR
S.FUEL_TYPE	<>	L.FUEL_TYPE  OR
  L.ID IS NULL
);

UPDATE MASTER.VEHICLE L 
SET	 
ORGANIZATION_ID	=	S.ORGANIZATION_ID	,
NAME	=	S.NAME	,
VIN	=	S.VIN	,
LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER	=	S.LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER	,
STATUS	=	S.STATUS	,
STATUS_CHANGED_DATE	=	S.STATUS_CHANGED_DATE	,
TERMINATION_DATE	=	S.TERMINATION_DATE	,
TYPE		=	S.TYPE	,
TCU_ID	=	S.TCU_ID	,
TCU_SERIAL_NUMBER	=	S.TCU_SERIAL_NUMBER	,
TCU_BRAND	=	S.TCU_BRAND	,
TCU_VERSION	=	S.TCU_VERSION	,
IS_TCU_REGISTER	=	S.IS_TCU_REGISTER  ,
REFERENCE_DATE	=	S.REFERENCE_DATE  ,
VEHICLE_PROPERTY_ID	=	S.VEHICLE_PROPERTY_ID  ,
CREATED_AT	=	S.CREATED_AT  ,
MODEL_ID	=	S.MODEL_ID  ,
OEM_ID	=	S.OEM_ID  ,
OEM_ORGANISATION_ID	=	S.OEM_ORGANISATION_ID  ,
OPT_IN	=	S.OPT_IN  ,
MODIFIED_AT	=	S.MODIFIED_AT  ,
IS_OTA	=	S.IS_OTA  ,
MODIFIED_BY	=	S.MODIFIED_BY  ,
FUEL_TYPE	=	S.FUEL_TYPE  
FROM    staging.Vehicle_CHG S
WHERE L.VID = S.VID 
AND L.VIN = S.VIN
  AND  S.CHG_FLG     = 'X';

select * from staging.vehicle_chg ;

SELECT 
E.ORGANIZATION_ID       ,
E.NAME                  ,
E.VIN                   ,
E.LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER  ,
E.STATUS                ,
E.STATUS_CHANGED_DATE   ,
E.TERMINATION_DATE      ,
E.VID                   ,
E.TYPE                  ,
E.TCU_ID                ,
E.TCU_SERIAL_NUMBER     ,
E.TCU_BRAND             ,
E.TCU_VERSION           ,
E.IS_TCU_REGISTER       ,
E.REFERENCE_DATE        ,
E.VEHICLE_PROPERTY_ID   ,
E.CREATED_AT            ,
E.MODEL_ID              ,
E.OEM_ID                ,
E.OEM_ORGANISATION_ID   ,
E.OPT_IN                ,
E.MODIFIED_AT           ,
E.IS_OTA                ,
E.MODIFIED_BY           ,
E.FUEL_TYPE             
FROM staging.Vehicle_CHG E
WHERE  E.CHG_FLG = 'I' 
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MASTER.VEHICLE L
             WHERE    L.VID = E.VID AND L.VIN = E.VIN)  and E.VIN is not null
ORDER BY 
    	E.VID,E.VIN;

SELECT distinct
vh.vehicle_creation_date as manufacture_date,
null as delivery_date,
vh.brand as make,
vh.extra_length as length,
vh.extra_height as height,
vh.extra_gross_weight as weight,
null as engine_id,
vh.extra_engine_type as engine_type,
vh.engine_power,
vh.extra_coolant as engine_coolant,
CASE WHEN vh.emission_level  is NULL THEN vh.CO2_NORM END as engine_emission_level,
vh.extra_chassis_number as chasis_id,
vh.extra_rear_overhang as chasis_rear_overhang,
case when vh.axle_configuration is null then REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.wheelPlanType'),'"','') end  as driveline_axle_configuration,
vh.extra_wheel_base as driveline_wheel_base,
vh.extra_tyre_size_front_axle_1 as driveline_tire_size,
null as transmission_gearbox_id,
vh.extra_gearbox_type  as transmission_gearbox_type,
vh.extra_chassis_number as cabin_id,
null as series_id,
REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.sdType'),'"','') as  series_vehicle_range,
case when vh.model_year is null then vh.construction_year end as model_year,
vh.extra_cab_type as cabin_type,
vh.extra_roof_spoiler  as cabin_roofspoiler,
'ECU Type' as electronic_control_unit_type,
'ECU control unit (SCU)' as electronic_control_unit_name,
'Gross' as weight_type,
CASE WHEN vh.extra_side_skirts = 'side skirts' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS chasis_side_skirts,
CASE WHEN vh.extra_side_collars = 'side collars' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS chasis_side_collar,
vh.extra_width  as width,
vh.model_name as type_id,
vh.vehicle_vid

from cle_pc_cvp_fap.vehicle vh
left join daf.co_connected_object co
on co.internal_id = vh.vehicle_vid
left join daf.co_connected_object_type typ
on typ.id = co.connected_object_type
left join daf.co_third_party prty
on typ.third_party_id = prty.id
left join cle_pc_cvp_fap.equipment eq
on eq.vehicle_id = vh.id
where vh.extra_chassis_number is not null;

activities.name: VehicleProperties_CHG
activities.description: Compares source and target and find the records for upsert

source.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
	coalesce(L.ID,0) AS ID,
	(select extract(epoch from cast(vp_dup.MANUFACTURE_DATE as timestamp))  * 1000) as MANUFACTURE_DATE,
  
S.DELIVERY_DATE                              ,
S.MAKE                                       ,
S.LENGTH                                     ,
S.HEIGHT                                     ,
S.WEIGHT                                     ,
S.ENGINE_ID                                  ,
S.ENGINE_TYPE                                ,
S.ENGINE_POWER                               ,
S.ENGINE_COOLANT                             ,
S.ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL                      ,
S.CHASIS_ID                                  ,
S.CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG                       ,
S.DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION               ,
S.DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE                       ,
S.DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE                        ,
S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID                    ,
S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE                  ,
S.CABIN_ID                                   ,
S.SERIES_ID                                  ,
S.SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE                       ,
S.MODEL_YEAR                                 ,
S.CABIN_TYPE                                 ,
S.CABIN_ROOFSPOILER                          ,
S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE               ,
S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME               ,
S.WEIGHT_TYPE                                ,
S.CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS                         ,
S.CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR                         ,
S.WIDTH                                      ,
S.TYPE_ID                        ,
	CASE WHEN L.ID IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END AS CHG_FLG,
	CURRENT_TIMeSTAMP AS LOAD_DT
	
FROM
       public.VehicleProperties S
LEFT JOIN 
       master.VehicleProperties L
ON S.CHASIS_ID = L.CHASIS_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT chasis_id,MAX(MANUFACTURE_DATE) as manufacture_date FROM public.vehicleproperties group by chasis_id) vp_dup
ON vp_dup.CHASIS_ID = S.CHASIS_ID
WHERE (
(select extract(epoch from cast(vp_dup.MANUFACTURE_DATE as timestamp))  * 1000)	<>	L.MANUFACTURE_DATE	OR
S.DELIVERY_DATE	<>	L.DELIVERY_DATE	OR
S.MAKE	<>	L.MAKE	OR
S.LENGTH	<>	L.LENGTH	OR
S.HEIGHT	<>	L.HEIGHT	OR
S.WEIGHT	<>	L.WEIGHT	OR
S.ENGINE_ID		<>	L.ENGINE_ID	OR
S.ENGINE_TYPE	<>	L.ENGINE_TYPE	OR
S.ENGINE_POWER	<>	L.ENGINE_POWER	OR
S.ENGINE_COOLANT	<>	L.ENGINE_COOLANT	OR
S.ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL	<>	L.ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL	OR
S.CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG	<>	L.CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG  OR
S.DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION	<>	L.DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION  OR
S.DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE	<>	L.DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE  OR
S.DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE	<>	L.DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE  OR
S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID	<>	L.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID  OR
S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE	<>	L.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE  OR
S.CABIN_ID	<>	L.CABIN_ID  OR
S.SERIES_ID	<>	L.SERIES_ID  OR
S.SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE	<>	L.SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE  OR
S.MODEL_YEAR	<>	L.MODEL_YEAR  OR
S.CABIN_TYPE	<>	L.CABIN_TYPE  OR
S.CABIN_ROOFSPOILER	<>	L.CABIN_ROOFSPOILER  OR
S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE	<>	L.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE  OR
S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME	<>	L.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME  OR
S.WEIGHT_TYPE	<>	L.WEIGHT_TYPE  OR
S.CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS	<>	L.CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS  OR
S.CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR	<>	L.CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR  OR
S.WIDTH	<>	L.WIDTH  OR
S.TYPE_ID	<>	L.TYPE_ID  OR
	    L.ID IS NULL
);

UPDATE MASTER.VEHICLEPROPERTIES L 
SET	 
MANUFACTURE_DATE	=	S.MANUFACTURE_DATE	,
DELIVERY_DATE	=	S.DELIVERY_DATE	,
MAKE	=	S.MAKE	,
LENGTH	=	S.LENGTH	,
HEIGHT	=	S.HEIGHT	,
WEIGHT	=	S.WEIGHT	,
ENGINE_ID		=	S.ENGINE_ID	,
ENGINE_TYPE	=	S.ENGINE_TYPE	,
ENGINE_POWER	=	S.ENGINE_POWER	,
ENGINE_COOLANT	=	S.ENGINE_COOLANT	,
ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL	=	S.ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL	,
CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG	=	S.CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG  ,
DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION	=	S.DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION  ,
DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE	=	S.DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE  ,
DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE	=	S.DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE  ,
TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID	=	S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID  ,
TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE	=	S.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE  ,
CABIN_ID	=	S.CABIN_ID  ,
SERIES_ID	=	S.SERIES_ID  ,
SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE	=	S.SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE  ,
MODEL_YEAR	=	S.MODEL_YEAR  ,
CABIN_TYPE	=	S.CABIN_TYPE  ,
CABIN_ROOFSPOILER	=	S.CABIN_ROOFSPOILER  ,
ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE	=	S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE  ,
ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME	=	S.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME  ,
WEIGHT_TYPE	=	S.WEIGHT_TYPE  ,
CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS	=	S.CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS  ,
CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR	=	S.CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR  ,
WIDTH	=	S.WIDTH  ,
TYPE_ID	=	S.TYPE_ID  
FROM    staging.VehicleProperties_CHG S
WHERE L.CHASIS_ID = S.CHASIS_ID 
  AND  S.CHG_FLG     = 'X';
  
select * from staging.vehicleproperties_chg;

SELECT 
E.MANUFACTURE_DATE                           ,
E.DELIVERY_DATE                              ,
E.MAKE                                       ,
E.LENGTH                                     ,
E.HEIGHT                                     ,
E.WEIGHT                                     ,
E.ENGINE_ID                                  ,
E.ENGINE_TYPE                                ,
E.ENGINE_POWER                               ,
E.ENGINE_COOLANT                             ,
E.ENGINE_EMISSION_LEVEL                      ,
E.CHASIS_ID                                  ,
E.CHASIS_REAR_OVERHANG                       ,
E.DRIVELINE_AXLE_CONFIGURATION               ,
E.DRIVELINE_WHEEL_BASE                       ,
E.DRIVELINE_TIRE_SIZE                        ,
E.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_ID                    ,
E.TRANSMISSION_GEARBOX_TYPE                  ,
E.CABIN_ID                                   ,
E.SERIES_ID                                  ,
E.SERIES_VEHICLE_RANGE                       ,
E.MODEL_YEAR                                 ,
E.CABIN_TYPE                                 ,
E.CABIN_ROOFSPOILER                          ,
E.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_TYPE               ,
E.ELECTRONIC_CONTROL_UNIT_NAME               ,
E.WEIGHT_TYPE                                ,
E.CHASIS_SIDE_SKIRTS                         ,
E.CHASIS_SIDE_COLLAR                         ,
E.WIDTH                                      ,
E.TYPE_ID                        
FROM staging.VehicleProperties_CHG E
WHERE  E.CHG_FLG = 'I' 
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MASTER.VEHICLEPROPERTIES L
             WHERE    L.CHASIS_ID = E.CHASIS_ID)
ORDER BY 
    	CHASIS_ID;

select distinct vh.id,
vh.vehicle_vid,
vh.extra_chassis_number as chasis_fuel_tank_number,
vh.extra_volume_fuel_tank as chasis_fuel_tank_volume
from cle_pc_cvp_fap.vehicle vh
left join daf.co_connected_object co
on co.internal_id = vh.vehicle_vid
left join daf.co_connected_object_type typ
on typ.id = co.connected_object_type
left join daf.co_third_party prty
on typ.third_party_id = prty.id
WHERE vh.extra_chassis_number is not null;

activities.name: VehicleFuelTankProperties_CHG
activities.description: Compares source and target and find the records for upsert

source.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
	coalesce(L.ID,0) AS ID,
	vh.ID as VEHICLE_ID                      ,  
S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER                              ,
S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME                                       ,
	CASE WHEN L.ID IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END AS CHG_FLG,
	CURRENT_TIMeSTAMP AS LOAD_DT
	
FROM
       public.VehicleFuelTankProperties S
LEFT JOIN master.vehicle vh
on vh.vid = S.vehicle_vid
LEFT JOIN 
       master.VehicleFuelTankProperties L
ON vh.id = L.vehicle_id

WHERE (
S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER	<>	L.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER  OR
	S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME	<>	L.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME  OR
	    L.ID IS NULL
);

UPDATE MASTER.VehicleFuelTankProperties L 
SET	 
CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER	=	S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER  ,
CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME	=	S.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME  
FROM    staging.VehicleFuelTankProperties_CHG S
WHERE L.vehicle_id = S.vehicle_id 
  AND  S.CHG_FLG     = 'X';

select * from staging.vehiclefueltankproperties_chg;

SELECT 
E.vehicle_id       ,
E.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER                  ,
E.CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_VOLUME
FROM staging.VehicleFuelTankProperties_CHG E
WHERE  E.CHG_FLG = 'I' 
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MASTER.VehicleFuelTankProperties_CHG L
             WHERE    L.vehicle_id = E.vehicle_id)
ORDER BY 
    	CHASIS_FUEL_TANK_NUMBER;
